website_summaries.verdict: Whether you grew up with Rare’s many hits or want to see what the big deal is, this inexpensive bundle features premium platformers, racers, shooters, beat ‘em ups, and so much more.
pros: 30 games from legendary game developer Rare, including Banjo-Kazooie, Conker’s BFD, and Grabbed by the Ghoulies
cons: Some of your favorite Rare games may not be here

customer_reviews.title: 🍺🍺🐿🍺🍺
customer_reviews.text: Yes, conker’s bad fur day is fully playable just like on n64. multi-player, cheat codes, and story mode are all untouched. I assume that’s all anyone is checking the reviews to see. 🍺🍺🐿🍺🍺
customer_reviews.author: roberdoom

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia Bomb
customer_reviews.text: This game would still be worth the price if it just came with the N64 games. If you're a fan of platformers definitely do your self a favor and purchase this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: A RARE giveaway!
customer_reviews.text: I've played a few minutes of every game in this collection and I'm satisfied. I love the set up. It's like a weird circus or theater or something. They have the art work on both sides of most of the games. I think it's cool. From the original NES to XBOX 360. I love retro games. It reminds me of back in the day. Do you know how much these games would cost if you bought them separately? 30 games for this price! Though, I wish they would've thrown at least one Donkey Kong game in here but that's ok. Of course, it's a few bad apples in here but it's still a good compilation.
customer_reviews.author: Tute

customer_reviews.title: Super good compilation
customer_reviews.text: I'd played the rerelease of banjo kazooie and conker on xbox and xbox 360 years ago and did not like the frame rate issues and controller response issues. The compilation one the xbox one offers an enhanced experience, with a 144hz freesync monitor and gamepad synced with a cable the game plays with no noticeable lag and looks beautiful with the hd texture updates. It also has a ton of the classic arcade titles I never got to play as a kid as well as perfect dark and several other titles that i thoroughly enjoy. I was on a nostalgia trip when i picked this up and was pleasantly suprised by the overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck title for Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth 15 bucks for the enormous amount of content you are getting. Nearly every Rare title from the N64 are here and a few newer titles. While there are no true remakes of any of the games here the games are nicely polished and look good. The Rare Replay collection is also the last to be getting the One X Enhanced treatment so that is sure to impress.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Dansen

customer_reviews.title: If you love Classic Rare Games this is the game for you!
customer_reviews.text: A great collection of Rare classic games from 80s-2000s lots of fun challenges for each game as well as great behind the scenes action of development stories for a lot of your favorite Rare games. At least 40 hours of gameplay. You really can't beat the price. The only thing that irritates me about this game is that most of the games don't have online play. As In, if the game didn't have online play originally then it doesn't have it in this. That was a major sticking point for me. Like it's not hard to build in online play for these retro titles. Lazy that they didn't include it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo J

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic and fun to play!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas stocking stuffer and it has been so fun to play. I hoped that more of the games would be couch co-op, but remembering back, not many of them are. We don't play many of these games that come with the bundle but have found a few of our favorites from the past that have been fun to play. We're big fans of nostalgia, so this was an awesome gift. However, I do wish there were more games on there that are more relevant.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Kids Wanted Viva Series
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple other games at random and got lucky...N64 graphics. I found the install odd. It installs a number of games directly, then the rest are accessed from the Rare Replay app. Guess those are the bad ones? If there is something you want from this set it is good, otherwise with is meh.
customer_reviews.author: barbre

customer_reviews.title: Original Games, no remakes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SOLELY to play Conker's Bad Fur Day multiplayer since its the original game. I do have live and reloaded and use that to play the story line. Having Banjo Kazooie is a bonus, however, there are 2 titles i wouldve loved to see. 007 and Diddy Kong racing. I also found a few new games that I like that I probably never wouldve thought to buy when they first came out (looking at you Viva Pinata)
customer_reviews.author: Wtfo

customer_reviews.title: I used the XBox ONE Brooks converter with my Street Fighter 5 PS4 fightstick and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for KI Gold. It contains the training mode that is not in the Classic version on the ONE. I have many of the older N64 games already. One glaring problem was my XBox ONE Killer Instinct Fightstick will not work with the Rare Replay. I suppose it has to do with the emulation. However, I used the XBox ONE Brooks converter with my Street Fighter 5 PS4 fightstick and it works like a charm. So just heads up to anyone who has had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Maness

customer_reviews.title: No disc. No refund.
customer_reviews.text: I was super stoked to get to play my childhood favorites again, only to receive an empty case. Weird, must be a fluke right? No. After reading through the invoice, I get to the product details which points out case only no game. Cool, somebody wants to spend over $10 on a game case, that someone is definitely not me. So I try and return it and what do you know, it’s non-refundable. Contact the seller only to hear back absolutely nothing. So now I’m stuck with a poorly advertised empty game case.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Eagle-King

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set of classic games, when I got my kids the new Xbox One S they wanted some of their older games and this disks has 30 games, though some they never played, there were ones that they really wanted on it. For the price this a great buy and will provide hours of entertainment to young and older gamers. I would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst not the best
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a lot of games but Most of them you have to add an update. They're not preloaded at all. After installing it and the system said it was ready to play, I went onto it to test it out. Got it mostly for sole purpose of Bad fur day. Have to have A LOT of space on your system and install an update to get majority of the games. Better off just finding the actual game if you have the system for it.
customer_reviews.author: RbeccaCha993

customer_reviews.title: Rare in bulk
customer_reviews.text: Amazing collection of classic Rare titles. Just trying to pick up Conkers is gonna set you back so much you might as well invest in the system that runs this fabulous collection
customer_reviews.author: Phantasmagoria

customer_reviews.title: There's a Reason it's Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Lots of crappy games. My boys, 11 and 12, didn't find one they wanted to play. Besides being very old games, they were made for much younger kids; say 6 or 7 year olds. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MGG

customer_reviews.title: Oh the memories
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and didn't pay attention to exactly what was on it, got it mainly for the banjo kazooie and perfect dark. But man, 30 games! Spanning years and some of the best games I played back then. Took a bit to get used to the different controls compared to origianl release....but was so much fun playing conkers, perfect dark, banjo, even viva pinata was a blast to play...definately worth the money if looking for retro play throughs
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun.  Best $30 I've spent in a long, long time!
customer_reviews.text: For any fan of any of these games, it is a no brainer even if you only like 1 game. However, there are so many gems in here, there is no reason not to purchase this. For $30, this is the steal of a lifetime. I've already played Perfect Dark, Kameo and several others and have to say, I love it! The coolest part is the old school way you get achievements...yes, your notifications are the old 360 style! Also, be aware that every game requires an update of at least 500mb, so I'm really thinking this disc is nothing more than an unlock tool to download the games.
customer_reviews.author: D. Couse

customer_reviews.title: A mixed bag,  but a lot are still fun
customer_reviews.text: This is an enjoyable collection. A few of the games are really, really old and no longer fun for more than a few minutes of nostalgia- but for the price ($16) it was a good deal. There are still some fun games here, especially the Viva Pinata titles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E.

customer_reviews.title: Crap games
customer_reviews.text: I admit that I don't recall these games when they were released; they're simply just not great games. You get a lot of games for the price, but my kids don't want to play any of them, and neither do I. Take a pass on this and buy one good used game for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Stayin

customer_reviews.title: It has, like, ALL the games.....
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo many games you guys. It has, like, ALL the games. Old arcade titles, NES titles, PC games, N64 games, Super nintendo games, Xbox games, etc., almost the entire Rare catalog. Really nice presentation. Some of the newer titles are a separate download, but that happens automatically when the game installs. Bonus features, unlockables, save states. A fun game to bust out when friends are chilling out
customer_reviews.author: Jon rosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game collection
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Xbox One and are looking for a collection of great games look no further. These games come from all eras including the 8bit home micro computers right up through the Xbox 360. Don't think for a second that because these are older games that they are dull. You'll have fun with everything on this disc.
customer_reviews.author: Ironchefkz

customer_reviews.title: If you see at least a couple games that you like, go for it
customer_reviews.text: It's really very simple. This game contains 30 full games from the 80's to 2000's developed by Rare. Check out the list. If you see at least a couple games that you like, go for it. It's worth it. Simple. This game is an incredible value and has already brought me over 50 hours of enjoyment and I have not even played half of the games.
customer_reviews.author: Rohbert

customer_reviews.title: A great tribute to 30 years of a great studio.
customer_reviews.text: Rare replay is a rare treat of video gaming for 2015. Not only is this a collection of quite a few beloved games at a great price, it is also a collection that truly plays tribute to the evolution of one of the greatest game developers and the games that they create. There are so many Easter eggs and hidden content that will make and Rare fan happy. At the slim price that it's listed at, this is a must own game for your Xbox collection.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It's a fun, nostalgic run
customer_reviews.text: There are games here that I played soon after college, that my sons played over and over, and that I never played before but knew friends that were jumping all over the place about. They're not simple, if that's what you might think. They're difficult and induce some head-scratching. And I'm still working on coordinating learned play from years ago on little tiny controllers, with the Xbone controller. The RC games, for instance, seem me to be very difficult on the Xbone controller, compared to their originals. So be it! You can't get the tunes out of your head, nor can you ever forget what you went through decades ago. It's a fun, nostalgic run!
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut da Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing!! So many great games from nintendo on up👍 I just love it!! You won't be sorry with this purchase if your a gamer..🎮
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2Four

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of fun games
customer_reviews.text: 30 games for less than one dollar per game, how can you go wrong? Granted, some of the games don't have much replay value for many younger players, but there are several great blockbuster titles packed on this disk which are well worth the purchase. Notably for me, original versions of Banjo Kazooie, Conker's Bad Fur Day and Perfect Dark from the N64 days (my favorite console of all time). Even for a seasoned gamer, there are countless hours of fun game play in this package and for many of us the nostalgic value is very high.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: If you think you’re going to beat battletoads don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Fun little collection I remember playing battletoads and never beating it so I picked this little jem up to play battletoads, still can’t beat it I’m pretty sure no one has ever beat it, its impossible, I now have a drinking problem and hate frogs so if your goal is to fulfill some childhood dream don’t bother you will end up alone drinking yourself to death wishing you never heard of battletoads
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great collection at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you cant beat this collection of games! It has some great throwbacks ( I wont lie I bought it solely for battletoads) as well as some newer games, even a couple 360 games like perfect dark. Has some REALLLLY old games on it too that are more than frustrating to play and you probably wont ever try more than once, but for the games it does have you get a great value, they need more collections like this!
customer_reviews.author: Shuoink

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I thought it was going to be. Got this game because it said it had many two player games on it for my kid to be able to play without having to be online. The games suck only ones worth it are the banjo kazooi ones
customer_reviews.author: micah hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Almost great!
customer_reviews.text: Some games aren't optimized properly for the Xbox One, and you're better off playing on older hardware -Banjo n Kazooie N&B runs terribly, unplayable if sub 30FPS is an issue for you. +Perfect Dark runs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RPTroop

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Game
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I was able to reclaim this game after my first copy was stolen from me. And I got it at a good price, too. I love having access to so many games on one disc. Now I get to play some of the games I never got the chance to, and I reclaimed one of my old favorite games, Perfect Dark.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Star

customer_reviews.title: One of the best deals in video games.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so maybe not all of the games are great, but there are certainly some classics in there from the British developer Rare. The way the game presents itself is top notch, with a colorful menu, different control schemes, a remind feature for older games and unlockable behind the scenes videos. The only real flaw with this collection, besides missing Donkey Kong and Goldeneye, is some of the Xbox 360 games run kind of poorly. Banjo Kazooie: Nuts and Bolts is extremely laggy and nearly unplayable. I have a feeling Microsoft is going to address this issue later on since Xbox 360 emulation is pretty new, but it renders some of the games in the collection useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan H.

customer_reviews.title: Hundreds, if not thousands, of hours of gameplay for $30.
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of history and content wrapped up in this collection. Some of the older Apple II games are pretty limited by today's standards, but as a historical record, they provide enough entertainment to be worth inclusion. Where the value really becomes overwhelming is with the newer games that provide hours of playability. I had previously purchased both Kameo and Perfect Dark Zero for the 360, and despite that I feel like I've gotten more than my $30 worth. With other game releases, I'm wishing I had more time to dedicate to all of the content on this disc, but I am almost embarrassed by all I've gotten for so little money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun!
customer_reviews.text: A total fun time romp through classic games and their remakes which made them even more fun , simple and uncomplicated mindless gaming! Excellent in every way
customer_reviews.author: Benjanim Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Great Collection Of Games
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting this collection since the day it was announced. So many great games from my childhood and quite a few I never got around to playing. Some games have aged a bit poorly and some games are made better with new controls. Kind of wish they'd be able to do a Nintendo properties version of this for the Switch that had all of their Donkey Kong games and Star Fox Adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri The White Mage

customer_reviews.title: It's Rare Replay, A Grand Display!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game full of some of the best classics from Rare such as Perfect Dark, Jet Force Gemini, Banjo Kazooie, and much, much more! With 30 games for 30 bucks, you just can't beat it. Just as a side note: a few of these games including Perfect Dark and Perfect Dark: Zero and others are actually separate game downloads that begin when you start the installation for the game. These separate games actually run on an emulator, so you are taken out of the main game in order to play them. With that said, getting back to the main game is as easy as holding the start button down for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Master Chief

customer_reviews.title: Tons o fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for around $11. It's an incredible value at that price and probably ly for more. It's a good collection of some varied games that may have nostalgic value for you as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Post

customer_reviews.title: Battletoads and Conkers Bad Fur Day!!!
customer_reviews.text: I basically bought this game for Battletoads and Conkers Bad Fur Day, but there are tons of other great games on here as well. Viva Pinata is actually pretty fun as is Jet Force Gemini and Blast Corps. Of course Banjo Kazooie is top notch. I dropped it a star because there isnt actually anything on the disc. All it does is trigger a download, so we had to wait a while before we could start battling toads, but other than that its great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gribble

customer_reviews.title: For those 80's, 90s, 2000's Kids. Then... Newcomers will enjoy it too.
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who played the SNES, Nintendo 64, and regular NES games and have joined Team Xbox(Microsoft). Us 80,90. and 2000 kids can relive parts of our childhood and the game collection keeps growing over time gradually. Love Rare-Ware always will. Introduce this game to kids who don't know what real games are. They are missing out since we saw games from almost the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: HurleyMan84

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved playing nintendo 64 and now I can still enjoy the classics. If you love the classics as well then you'll love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Blast to the past
customer_reviews.text: This game is a blast! So many games and for a great price. This game takes me back to my childhood. This game gas notable titles like Conkers bad fur day and Banjo kazooie. Its hours of fun and even has local multiplayer on it. I love having friends over and bonding over games from our childhood. I cannot reccomend this game enough. The only gripe I have with it is hour the Xbox organizes the games. It downloaded all the Xbox 360 games from rare replay and cluttered up my Games Library.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Vela

customer_reviews.title: Banjo Kazooie Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I mostly got this to play banjo kazooie/tooie but I ended up liking some of the other games as well! Took up a lot of space on my xbox but seems like you can't avoid that with any game.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile buy!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it was XBox One (I don't have one) only. But I gave it to my nephew and he seems to enjoy it a lot! Great collection of games in one spot. Well worthwhile buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son but I play as well! Lol I like that the first and second Viva Pinata is on the disc, I loved that game growing up. Plus as far as pricing this is a steal, everywhere else I looked the game was in the 40-50 range (maybe that just because it's NEW)
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Has 3 Banjo and Kazooie games!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for some more kid friendly games for our kids who were introduced to the Nintendo 64, but the games now a days are so expensive. We came across this and bought this for the kids for the 3 Banjo and Kazooie games. It has the original Banjo and Kazooie game just like it was on the Nintendo 64. If you're looking for Banjo and Kazooie at all, I suggest buying this game where you get 3 plus some other games!
customer_reviews.author: Mollly

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of games
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a great package if you don't already have the 360 games included in the bundle. All 360 games have to be downloaded and use 360 emulator to play (6000 GS). The other games from other consoles are included on the disc (4000 GS). Some of the older games are pretty poor in quality, but other games included in the package make up for them. Worth the price alone just for Concor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: It's good but at the same time nostalgia is often better ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good but at the same time nostalgia is often better left to memory rather than seeing how much graphics have changed.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item. No return allowed.
customer_reviews.text: This is for x box 360. Not x box one. And this set is not backward compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t download
customer_reviews.text: Won’t download on Xbox one.. tried several things and nothing would work.. wish could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jordie Hale

customer_reviews.title: It feels like I’m a kid with no responsibilities again
customer_reviews.text: My older cousin introduced me to Conkers as I was growing up, and I had always wanted to play it again. But since N64 copies are hard to find, this is a miracle!! I was so excited I got him, my younger cousin and friends to buy a copy in order to relieve those days of fighting teddiz
customer_reviews.author: Andy Morga

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia for days!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is great to visit games like Jetforce Gemini and Conkers Bad Furday from my childhood digitally remastered! A must buy for any gaming 90's kid!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peggs

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for some of the classic games we grew up on. Not recommended for older kids who cant appreciate the graphics lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Solid game
customer_reviews.text: Girls enjoyed playing this game. Definitely wasn't one of their top choices for the last year.
customer_reviews.author: DannyG

customer_reviews.title: Part of father day present
customer_reviews.text: So I gave this present early for my husband and he loves every second of this game, it's like he is a little kid again and now we have two boys who are enjoying playing some battle toads with their father
customer_reviews.author: xreif1326

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had N64 version of Perfect Dark but still overall worth it alone for nostalgia and easy achievements.
customer_reviews.text: 30 games for like 26$ thats a pretty damn good bargain. LOTS of easy achievements, all you have to do is play each game to earn easy ones not to mention the ones you get for beating the games. Tons of classic games, my biggest complaint is the Perfect Dark on here is not the N64 one but instead the 360 versions.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: all the others are an excellent bonus. Game works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: So much nostalgia built into one game. Nothing beats going through the only N64 games. I'd pay for just those, all the others are an excellent bonus. Game works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, got the games installed without any issues. I only bought it because of like 2 games, haven't ever played most of them. The games do have a weird border thing on them when you play them, but they make not scale correctly. I haven't tried yet. The game I played looks exactly the same way I remember it, which is fine by me, so don't expect to see updated graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Completely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This game has brought me hours of enjoyment so far and will likely give me many, many more in the future. From the nostalgia-inspiring classics of my youth like Banjo and Conker to the great games I never got around to playing like Perfect Dark and Battletoads, Rare Replay represents probably the best $30 I've ever spent on video games. The N64 games alone make this worth it for me, as that was my favorite system, but the 360 games and all the classics added in really make this the best value you can get in a game.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vrana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely worth it for the price. Having not really grown up with video games, it's nice being able to play some games that I never had growing up (for me, Kameo was worth it for the price alone). I only wish they had revived Donkey Kong: Country which was one of the few Rare games I actually had experience with.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Have you seen my son?
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kid. I haven't seen him in 2 weeks. So I guess the game is good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best game collection to date!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! 30 retro games for $30 made me pre order the second I heard it was announced! Like a previous review stated Conker's Bad Fur Day is $60 for the n64 and Baattletoads for the nes is around $70 so those two games alone make this collection worth it to me. And with alot of couch and online co-op action Rare Replay is a great collection of games to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Spindler

customer_reviews.title: Rare Replay - Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son he loves it and great game , fast shipping and no damage
customer_reviews.author: Wandakay

customer_reviews.title: Very cool collection of retro games
customer_reviews.text: Very cool collection of retro games, a great way to introduce someone to games we played as a kid. This was purchased as a gift for a child family member. Great value, as you get 30 games in one disc. Sure to provide hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Tons of games for a reasonable price, a lot of games from childhood.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite squirrel
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price for Conkers Bad Fur Day and the Banjo games alone, but you get a bunch more good games too!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Medina

customer_reviews.title: Allow inverting the axis for all games
customer_reviews.text: Let me invert the Axis on these games. I understand these are throwback games, but the thing is why won't you make the change to some of them to invert the axis? I guess I had in my mind that this one change would have been possible. Definitely would have made Conker's Bad Fur Day better.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Rare Replay Best Comeback!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about rare replay!! 1. The price is outstanding 30 games for 30$ 2. You have hundreds of hours of gameplay between all 30 games 3. If you remember growing up playing a lot of these games. you can re live the old days of gaming. 4. Conker bad fur day is very expensive on its original platform but now this will solve that problem for a lot gamers who's not willing to cough up the money. 5. All games play flawlessly without any interruptions to frame rate ( which it shouldn't ). Controls are simple and fun P.S A Must Have For The Hardcore Gamers to the Causal Gamers.
customer_reviews.author: DonovanRamos

customer_reviews.title: All the games are great, except conkers bad fur day
customer_reviews.text: All the games are great, except conkers bad fur day. They clearly polished a few of their games to make them look better but Conker seems to be the one that suffered as it still has awful N-64 graphics. Considering they released a HD remake on the original X-box I would have preferred that version as long as they removed the censorship. Other than that, All the games are enjoyable and a blast to play.
customer_reviews.author: A Person On Here

customer_reviews.title: Super deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew when he got his Xbox One for his birthday. He really likes that he has a variety of games to play and all from one "disc". It did take a bit of time download all of the updates but the game is worth the low price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: codered1126

customer_reviews.title: this is a steal of a deal and hardcopies are better.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to play retro games on the big screen, this is a steal of a deal and hardcopies are better.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Got it for conqures bad fur day!! Great games!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: ... off of id software games and demastered them its fun
customer_reviews.text: the games are really uninspired they really just ripped off of id software games and demastered them its fun tho
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: I love the compilation of games
customer_reviews.text: I love the compilation of games, but found the menu system and control systems horribly wanting. If you like the games, its well worth it, just beware its not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to add to collection...
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting this game for my collection. Has a lot of games I already have on other systems. But, this collection is nice to have. Just make sure you have room to download it all. Very happy with purchase. Game arrived quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Compilation
customer_reviews.text: So much nostalgia, this game is perfect for me and my wife. If your a rare fan it's a must have. The emulation system is flawless and they went the extra mile in making it more than just a big menu of old games
customer_reviews.author: Russell J Young

customer_reviews.title: Classic Bang for your Buck, Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It has the ORIGINAL Conker's bad fur day from N64. Seriously, paired with other classics this is a must for any collection.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Strobeck

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Title to Own
customer_reviews.text: This re-release of classic games provides excellent value for the money considering the quality and generous amount of titles. While I have never played some of the older titles until I purchased this disc, I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of fun I've had with this set. I highly recommend this disc to fans of older, classic games.
customer_reviews.author: AMG77

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia city.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a walk down memory lane for anyone who grew up a gamer. The selection is on point and they have battletoads! My oldest son is really getting a kick out of the games I used to enjoy. I see many hours of game play and jot to be had here. Really a heck of a deal for the price. The only negative I've come across is its hard to choose the.player you want to be on some games.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dark
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this solely to play Perfect Dark. Works perfect and can reminisce.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this game it reminds him of his childhood the only complaint he has as that some of the games have borders. Other then that he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzylove

customer_reviews.title: Gaming nostalgia at its best.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bunch of old Nintendo 64 games. What could be better than that? It's an amazing collection of games.
customer_reviews.author: David VW

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Returned it and downloaded for free on gamepass. Very nostalgic and fun though!
customer_reviews.author: Junior Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Good on you Rare
customer_reviews.text: Great presentation. Nice progression with unlockables. An amazing value especially for people like myself who only played DKC 1-3 and none of Rare's other titles.
customer_reviews.author: Suchadoge

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck I've found in an Xbox One game package.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value! Most games are very good. A few are a bit weak, but our of 30 games there are enough to me busy for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two games, Banjo Kazooie and Blast Corps...but I've had so much fun revisiting the other Rare games as well. They are all as fun and frustrating as I remember them being the first time I played them growing up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle @ In Libris Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Was only about $18. Case broke through shipping so I had to put the disc in a spare Xbox 360 case. Has some awesome games from rare.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyH

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought it for my boyfriend becuase it has conquars bad fur day on it. I love that it has banjo kazooie too! It came in early & it was nicely packaged. Theres plent of games to try on it that ive never even heard off too.
customer_reviews.author: Melany Silivs

customer_reviews.title: This is a really fun game, a few of the n64 games have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game, a few of the n64 games have pretty awful controls though (Jet Force Gemini) and are still in 480p aspect ratio
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Your demands suck
customer_reviews.text: Seriously Amazon? In order to give a rating, I have to give a review too? I'm just not going to rate anything anymore
customer_reviews.author: greg christensen

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's super fun to be able to play the old games I grew up playing. I play offline and the game works fine, you just need internet for the initial game download.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: awesome trip down memory lane !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game. I got it as a gift for my boyfriend and he LOVED it. He has been into videogames all his life, so this was an aweosme trip down memory lane for him. Some games even allow for 2 players !!!
customer_reviews.author: NicoleJanelle

customer_reviews.title: It's Rare to have a nice collection for such good price!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this masterpiece. The only minor gripe is some slowdowns in Xbox360 games as I am assuming it's using some kind of 360 emulator? If you never had the privilege to experience part of the golden age of gaming this is your chance. Don't miss it!
customer_reviews.author: Solid

customer_reviews.title: Cool game
customer_reviews.text: Love Jet Force Gemini. Game brings back a lot of memories.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover101

customer_reviews.title: System Seller for Nostalgic fans
customer_reviews.text: The games are great, and hold up well. The only thing that disappointed me was the fact that the games were not all in the rare replay, some of them installed separately. This is a minor issue however, this is easily the best bang for you buck on Xbox One, and one of the main reasons to own the console.
customer_reviews.author: TheMovieHero

customer_reviews.title: This game is pretty awesome. You get the older games all in ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty awesome . You get the older games all in one pkg on one disc . instead of the Nintendo you get to play it ok Xbox . This is something I'm definitely recommending to friends who like the throwbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Conker is the only reason I bought this but the fact that there are 29 other games is a huge bonus! I'm almost certain I will be playing a few other games just to see what they're like and who knows I might find another franchise that I will enjoy for years to come. Also the controls are a lot more smooth for older games due to the fact that the xbox controller makes the games 10x easier to navigate and move around in older games (compared to the Nintendo 64 controls' at least) Overall great buy and a must have for Xbox gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Damaged case, no harm to disc
customer_reviews.text: Bought this “new” but the spine on the game case was broken just about clean down the middle. Disc was not damaged thankfully. Wish item wasn’t damaged since I bought it “new”.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: My inner child is happy with glee!
customer_reviews.text: Ah! I'm in love with this! My inner child is filled with joy, and I feel like a child again, playing Perfect Dark and getting angry with Banjo. I will say, that I was amazed by how well the graphics looked on Perfect Dark. Great game, and 30 games for $30 is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Back in my day!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful collection of classic games. This set is filled with winners and some that should have remained in the past but all in all a phenomenal collection. Even the less than amazing games have a charm about them that makes them worth at least one play through.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mostly just bought for Conkers but can't wait to check out all the other games too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Behan

product_meta.title: Rare Replay - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionTo celebrate its 30th anniversary, Rare brings together the adventures of its iconic characters in a collection that spans the decades. From its earliest 2D classics to Xbox 360 triumphs, Rare Replay delivers a gaming treasure trove for veteran players and newcomers alike. As you brawl with the Battletoads, grab Jiggies in Banjo-Kazooie and fight the future in Perfect Dark, you'll uncover bonus content and exclusive looks at the creation of Rare Replay's hits. Master the basics or test your skills with all-new snapshot challenges and 10,000 Gamerscore. Gaming's greatest are back, lovingly presented and exclusively on Xbox One!
feature_bullets: Celebrate Rare's 30th Anniversary with a jaw-dropping collection of 30 iconic games, lovingly presented for Xbox One.
Enjoy over 60 minutes of behind-the-scenes interviews and footage
10,000 Gamerscore points available and 700+ hours of gameplay.
Tackle snapshot challenges and enjoy exclusive bonus features.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,133 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
